description: This file is the main entry point for a web API application, setting up services, CORS policy, and configuring middleware including OpenAPI/Swagger and a health check endpoint.

classes.name: WebApplication
classes.description: Main class representing the web application, used for configuring the server, middlewares, and endpoints.

methods.name: CreateBuilder
methods.description: Creates and configures the WebApplication builder with default and custom services.

methods.name: AddEndpointsApiExplorer
methods.description: Registers services required for API endpoint discovery.

methods.name: AddCors
methods.description: Registers CORS services with specific policy.

methods.name: SetIsOriginAllowed
methods.description: Allows all origins in the CORS policy.

methods.name: AllowAnyMethod
methods.description: Allows all HTTP methods for CORS.

methods.name: AllowAnyHeader
methods.description: Allows any headers in CORS requests.

methods.name: UseCors
methods.description: Enables CORS middleware with the specified policy.

methods.name: UseSwaggerUi
methods.description: Configures Swagger UI at specified path.

methods.name: MapGet
methods.description: Defines a GET endpoint for health check.
